Title: Simple Hand Tracking with MS Kinect SDK & WPF
Description: KinectHandTracking makes it easier for MS Kinect SDK developers to track the hands and tell whether a hand is making a fist. It's developed in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
KinectHandTracking makes it easier for MS Kinect SDK developers to track the hands and tell whether a hand is making a fist. It's developed in C#.

I'm doing my best to make it work in a very simple way.
though it's unstable now.
